idea-plugin.name: Maven Archetypes
idea-plugin.description: This plugin helps to generate initial java project layout with the help of Maven Archetypes.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
This plugin helps to generate initial java project layout with the help of Maven Archetypes.

How to use

  • Select archetype group;
  • Select archetype;
  • Enter groupId, artifactId, version for your project;
  • Click on Generate button. New project will be generated in the current directory.
Changes:
  • 1.0.1
    1. 1. Downgrading java version to 1.5 (to be compatible for Mac users)
    2. 2. Changing appfuse version to 2.0.1
    3. 3. Separating archetypes.xml file from jar file (make it avalilable for user modifications).
  • 1.0.0
